file_content.text: Agee Eleven = monitoring priority comm channels
Destroyers of counterpart unit D-2B8 = deserve punishment // You = answer summons on Carrick Station
You = match Emergency Response Corps database // You = stand by for priority alert
This is Jedi Grand Master Satele Shan, initiating emergency command protocol "corestar." The Republic is under attack by renegade Sith forces.
The Jedi enclave on Rhinnal has been destroyed, along with the Republic patrol frigate "Toron Voq."
Rendezvous immediately at Carrick Station and contact me there for further orders.
I've never heard Master Satele that upset before.
Things must be especially bad.
Many friends + allies = killed
The Sith are attacking Jedi enclaves and capital ships? Why isn't this all over the HoloNet?
We're at war?
Sith forces = unknown + not Imperial aligned // Master Satele = full details
I don't respond well to being ordered around.
She didn't say "please."
Emergency command protocol "corestar" = highest alert // Answering call = right thing to do
Agee counterpart unit D-2B8 = served aboard patrol frigate Toron Voq // D-2B8 = destroyed
You = answer summons + make enemy pay?
I didn't realize astromech droids were programmed to seek revenge.
It's an odd request from you.
D-2B8 = good counterpart + irreplaceable // Punishing destroyers = justice
The Sith will be punished.
Enemy punishment = severe // You = no mercy for Sith
Don't be stupid, droid.
You = understand // D-2B8 = good counterpart + deserved to continue functioning
You = rendezvous at Carrick Station + contact Master Satele
Agee Eleven = monitoring priority comm channels
